name: Solitaire Christmas. Match 2 Cards Free. Card Game
name_original: Solitaire Christmas. Match 2 Cards Free. Card Game
description:
Solitaire Christmas. Match 2 Cards. Card Game is a holiday card game filled with the joyful spirit of the holidays. The anticipation of Christmas miracles and 120 unique levels form a winning combination for fans of classic solitaire. After all, what more could a solitaire player want other than meals with their relatives in a cozy house, snowball fights, christmas trees, brightly colored presents, fresh snow, the beauty of the winter season, and having a ball sledding and ice skating?

This game is for people who enjoy Spider Solitaire, Pyramid, Klondike, Free Cell, Crescent, Golf, Addiction, Three Peaks, Yukon, Forty Thieves, Scorpion, Gaps, Canfield, Crazy Quilt, Algerian, Montana, Eight Off, Calculation, and Clock Solitaire.

But regardless of the type, solitaire is an age-old game that never loses its flavor! Match 2 cards of any suit, try your luck in a seemingly endless amount of levels, and toss out the joker card to let the joyful emotions of the Christmas season wash over you!

Solitaire Christmas. Match 2 Cards. Card Game is a fun new twist on traditional solitaire for players who love to try new types of deals! Find and match any 2 cards quickly to increase your winnings! Buy bonuses using the following coins: shuffle, undo last move, and joker. Choose your difficulty level, and maybe even go for Professional, but be warned: this is only for true lovers of solitaire! Let the relaxing music and premium graphics take you away into the wonderful atmosphere of the holidays.

- Card solitaire game for new players and experts alike
- Make any purchase – turn off ads!
- Unique game mechanics – choosing pairs of cards
- Use various bonuses – mulligan, shuffle, joker
- Collect gold cards to complete levels and unlock new locations
- Collect bonus cards to get more coins and bonuses
- Collect cards fast to make combos and get good rewards
- 12 locations, 120 levels and several difficulty modes
- For daring players, we offer special tasks and over 20 colorful trophies
- Colorful high-quality graphics put you right in a winter wonderland!
- Original themed decks and 9 card backs
- Beautiful music to help you relax and concentrate on the game
